channel.title: Custom's
channel.description: As most of you know, rsps's are going to shit. 99% of the server's have gay ass customs like pink h'weens.. But.. there are still some servers with quite unique customs that i want your take on, for example: http://www.rune-server.org/runescape-development/rs2-server/show-off/421339-my-custom-home-scratch.html Would u like to play a server with that in it ? If so, why ?

item.title: Custom's
item.dc:creator: @JavaTC JavaTC
item.description:
@JavaTC wrote:

Tutorial:

In my opinion, if you were willing to put as much effort into this, to the point of where you are trying to create custom maps, I would just get involved in your own game.

Considering how much of a mess most servers’ code is, I would say you’re right :rolleyes:

Read full topic

In my opinion, if you were willing to put as much effort into this, to the point of where you are trying to create custom maps, I would just get involved in your own game.

item.title: Custom's
item.dc:creator: @Host_Gushers Host Gushers
item.description:
@Host_Gushers wrote:

For some reason i feel like learning how to make a custom island and set it as my home.
If someone knows how, add me on skype. Rspsdesigner

Read full topic

item.title: Custom's
item.dc:creator: @Lin Lin
item.description:
@Lin wrote:

Yes, it’s been an idea of mine to create a custom island with everything needed on it. However, that island looks really shitty so I would consider not.

Read full topic

item.title: Custom's
item.dc:creator: @Java-RSPS-Noob Java-RSPS-Noob
item.description:
@Java-RSPS-Noob wrote:

[quote=“runescape sucks, post:6, topic:525328”]You can go right with customs, it’s just that the majority of people assume that adding 300 more rares to the game will make there server cooler. Things like what this person has done, is quite amazing, imo. Why? Because I can’t do it myself(cba to learn), and it looks quite well.[/quote]When Jack and I ran Myth-Scape we could sell every custom for $60 each lol. For that matter, there were so MANY customs that looked nice we could sell one, add an extra price on it for “only one in the game” and then still have plenty of different customs to sell. Of course, a lot of the customs had effects but still.

Read full topic

item.title: Custom's
item.dc:creator: @runescape_sucks runescape sucks
item.description:
@runescape_sucks wrote:

You can go right with customs, it’s just that the majority of people assume that adding 300 more rares to the game will make there server cooler. Things like what this person has done, is quite amazing, imo. Why? Because I can’t do it myself(cba to learn), and it looks quite well.

Read full topic

item.title: Custom's
item.dc:creator: @Fire_capez Fire capez
item.description:
@Fire_capez wrote:

customs offer me a new perspective of the game, i enjoyed it when i first started playing servers as it felt like runescape with a few things i had never seen before

Read full topic

item.title: Custom's
item.dc:creator: @asshole_rule asshole_rule
item.description:
@asshole_rule wrote:

Way to extremely exaggerate… less then 25% of servers have ‘gay ass customs like pink h’weens’. This isn’t 2007 anymore.

and no I wouldn’t play that server(wouldnt play any server just cause of a map). That map looks horrible. It’s one of the best custom maps I’ve seen, but it still looks completely unnatural.

[ul][li]There’s no difference in height level anywhere[/li]
[li]The grass doesn’t differentiate in color anywhere[/li]
[li]There are no roofs[/li]
[li]the island is a complete rectangle[/li][/ul]

The only person who should be making custom maps atm is Harry, because he has a great map editor that makes maps look like REAL RS maps.

Read full topic

item.title: Custom's
item.dc:creator: @doom_j doom_j
item.description:
@doom_j wrote:

[quote=“Host Gushers, post:1, topic:525328”]As most of you know, rsps’s are going to shit. 99% of the server’s have gay ass customs like pink h’weens… But… there are still some servers with quite unique customs that i want your take on, for example:
http://www.rune-server.org/runescape-development/google/show-off/421339-my-custom-home-scratch.html
Would u like to play a server with that in it ? If so, why ?[/quote]

If they did all that with a map creator then nice job, but please don’t tell me they created all that server side…

As for custom items blame Silabsoft.

Read full topic
